Html:
Hi, I need your help with one issue. I already found the list which helps me to achieve most of my goals "CSE name sequence*". However my bibliography list has both English and Russian names in it.

The default alphabetical order is:
English A-Z
Russian "A-Z" 

What I need is:

Russian A-Z
English A-Z

So i just need Russian Authors preceede the English ones in one list of books.
